description.full: Get a piece of the action in the Battlefield™ Hardline Beta. Experience 2 of the new “Cops and Criminals” oriented modes with Heist and Hotwire or jump in a classic match of Battlefield Conquest in 26-player thrilling battles. • Heist is all about pulling off that big job or that perfect score. The criminals are trying to break into a vault, and the cops must stop them.  • In Hotwire, the criminals are trying to steal a list of marked cars while the cops are trying to repossess them. Use your driving skills to catch up with the enemy, and bring a friend riding shotgun to take them down. • A Battlefield staple, Conquest is based on the idea of controlling a base. Capture a base by standing near a control point on foot, in a vehicle or in the skies. The first team to run out of tickets loses.
